meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6048.

td.p: Dennis Loo, a tutor from Cambridge, Massachusetts
Ester Murdukhayeva, a law student originally from Queens, New York
Tom Nissley, an online books editor from Seattle, Washington (whose 6-day cash winnings total $184,203)

tr.td: JOYCE TO THE WORLD
HOLIDAY ALBUMS
GATHER 'ROUND THE "TRE"
OH BOY! PRESENTS!
ON THE DAY AFTER CHRISTMAS
IN DEFENSE OF FRUITCAKE
